  * #  News Release 




« [Back](#)

## 

ICON plc to Present at the Jefferies London Healthcare Conference

November 13, 2024 

[PDF Version](/node/17461/pdf)

DUBLIN--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Nov. 13, 2024-- [ICON plc](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.iconplc.com%2F&esheet=54151139&newsitemid=20241112525366&lan=en-US&anchor=ICON+plc&index=1&md5=43aed590da26dd3832cf189615872808), (NASDAQ: ICLR) a world-leading healthcare intelligence and clinical research organisation, today announced that Dr. Steve Cutler, CEO of ICON plc and Mr. Nigel Clerkin, CFO of ICON plc will present at the Jefferies London Healthcare Conference on Thursday, November 21, 2024 at 8:00am GMT. 

Any changes to this event and links to the live webcast will be posted on the Investor section of our website under “[Events](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=https%3A%2F%2Finvestor.iconplc.com%2Fevents-presentations&esheet=54151139&newsitemid=20241112525366&lan=en-US&anchor=Events&index=2&md5=5c1c1c16d8d3f7fd407ec1aed292bac5)”. 

**About ICON plc**

ICON plc is a world-leading healthcare intelligence and clinical research organisation. From molecule to medicine, we advance clinical research providing outsourced services to pharmaceutical, biotechnology, medical device and government and public health organisations. We develop new innovations, drive emerging therapies forward and improve patient lives. With headquarters in Dublin, Ireland, ICON employed approximately 42,250 employees in 106 locations in 55 countries as at September 30, 2024. For further information about ICON, visit: [www.iconplc.com](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.iconplc.com&esheet=54151139&newsitemid=20241112525366&lan=en-US&anchor=www.iconplc.com&index=3&md5=8cc1e250aae361e5803eeba42474d059). 

This press release contains forward-looking statements, including statements about our financial guidance. These statements are based on management's current expectations and information currently available, including current economic and industry conditions. These statements are not guarantees of future performance or actual results, and actual results, developments and business decisions may differ from those stated in this press release. The forward-looking statements are subject to future events, risks, uncertainties and other factors that could cause actual results to differ materially from those projected in the statements, including, but not limited to, the ability to enter into new contracts, maintain client relationships, manage the opening of new offices and offering of new services, the integration of new business mergers and acquisitions, as well as other economic and global market conditions and other risks and uncertainties detailed from time to time in SEC reports filed by ICON, all of which are difficult to predict and some of which are beyond our control. For these reasons, you should not place undue reliance on these forward-looking statements when making investment decisions. The word "expected" and variations of such words and similar expressions are intended to identify forward-looking statements. Forward-looking statements are only as of the date they are made and we do not undertake any obligation to update publicly any forward-looking statement, either as a result of new information, future events or otherwise. More information about the risks and uncertainties relating to these forward-looking statements may be found in SEC reports filed by ICON, including its Form 20-F, F-1, F-4, S-8, F-3 and certain other reports, which are available on the SEC's website at [http://www.sec.gov](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.sec.gov&esheet=54151139&newsitemid=20241112525366&lan=en-US&anchor=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.sec.gov&index=4&md5=3943da488cd3c5d8e8252c10c93ab25b). 

**ICON/ICLR-G**

![](https://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=bwnews&sty=20241112525366r1&sid=acqr8&distro=nx&lang=en)

View source version on [businesswire.com](http://businesswire.com): <https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20241112525366/en/>

Kate Haven Vice President Investor Relations +1888 381 7923 

Source: ICON plc

## ICON Privacy Preference Centre

  * ### Your Privacy

  * ### Strictly Necessary Cookies

  * ### Performance Cookies

  * ### Functional Cookies

  * ### Targeting Cookies




#### Your Privacy

When you visit any website, it may store or retrieve information on your browser, mostly in the form of cookies. This information might be about you, your preferences or your device and is mostly used to make the site work as you expect it to. The information does not usually directly identify you, but it can give you a more personalized web experience. Because ICON respects your right to privacy, you can choose not to allow some types of cookies. Click on the different category headings to find out more and change our default settings. Note, however, that blocking some types of cookies may impact your experience of the site and the services we are able to offer. [Cookie Notice](/site-cookies)

User ID:  e8cc7c02-1825-4010-8da0-d81b53449027

#### Strictly Necessary Cookies

Always Active

These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information.

Cookies Details‎

#### Performance Cookies

Performance Cookies

These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site. All information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous. If you do not allow these cookies we will not know when you have visited our site, and will not be able to monitor its performance.

Cookies Details‎

#### Functional Cookies

Functional Cookies

These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalisation. They may be set by us or by third party providers whose services we have added to our pages. If you do not allow these cookies then some or all of these services may not function properly.

Cookies Details‎

#### Targeting Cookies

Targeting Cookies

These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites. They do not store directly personal information, but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted advertising.

Cookies Details‎

  1. [Home](/)

# Press releases

  * ![icon-building-dublin](https://icon.widen.net/content/kd3uulpxfb/web/icon-building-dublin.jpg?crop=yes&w=545&h=545&itok=XuVOhkZO)

23 October 2024

### [ ICON Reports Third Quarter 2024 Results  ](/news-events/press-releases/ICON-reports-third-quarter-2024-results)

ICON plc today reported its financial results for the third quarter ended September 30, 2024

  * ![icon-dublin-office-headquarters](https://icon.widen.net/content/udzs5nykqq/web/icon-dublin-office-headquarters.jpg?crop=yes&w=545&h=545&itok=OHE5SIx2)

27 September 2024

### [ ICON plc Schedules Third Quarter 2024 Earnings Conference Call  ](/news-events/press-releases/icon-plc-schedules-third-quarter-2024-earnings-conference-call)

ICON plc today announced that it will release its financial results for the third quarter 2024 after the market closes on Wednesday, October 23, 2024.

  * ![Oncology survey report web assets](https://icon.widen.net/content/xnzlwstnhh/web/Square%20thumbnail_OncologySurveyreport.jpg?crop=yes&w=545&h=545&itok=XGGhlOgo)

12 September 2024

### [ ICON survey highlights scale of focus on precision therapies in increasingly complex oncology landscape  ](/news-events/press-releases/icon-survey-highlights-scale-focus-precision-therapies-increasingly)

ICON plc today announced results from a recent survey of over 100 professionals engaged in oncology drug development to understand the current state of emerging oncology treatment development, including the associated clinical trial dynamics.

  * ![exterior-of-icon-hq-building-dublin-ireland](https://icon.widen.net/content/6nlrjleblj/web/exterior-of-icon-hq-building-dublin-ireland?crop=yes&w=545&h=545&itok=mpMndzck)

03 September 2024

### [ ICON plc to present at the Baird 2024 Global Healthcare Conference  ](/news-events/press-releases/icon-plc-present-baird-2024-global-healthcare-conference)

Tuesday, 10 September, 2024 at 3:45pm ET. 

  * ![ICON_Dublin-Reception](https://icon.widen.net/content/vrggzw7eao/web/ICON_Dublin-Reception.jpg?crop=yes&w=545&h=545&itok=ATSLXcIK)

14 August 2024

### [ ICON Announces appointment of new Chief Financial Officer (CFO)  ](/news-events/press-releases/icon-announces-appointment-new-chief-financial-officer-cfo)

ICON plc (NASDAQ: ICLR), a world-leading healthcare intelligence and clinical research organization, today announced the appointment of Nigel Clerkin as its new Chief Financial Officer (CFO). 

  * ![icon-dublin-office-headquarters](https://icon.widen.net/content/udzs5nykqq/web/icon-dublin-office-headquarters.jpg?crop=yes&w=545&h=545&itok=8N_uKMFD)

24 July 2024

### [ ICON Reports Second Quarter 2024 Results  ](/news-events/press-releases/icon-reports-second-quarter-2024-results)

ICON plc today reported its financial results for the second quarter ended June 30, 2024.

  * ![icon-dublin-office-hq-building](https://icon.widen.net/content/pmedgzmm9y/web/icon-dublin-office-hq-building.jpg?crop=yes&w=545&h=545&itok=h0NXpN3E)

24 July 2024

### [ ICON announces results of Annual General Meeting and changes to the Board of Directors  ](/news-events/press-releases/icon-announces-results-annual-general-meeting-and-changes-board)

ICON plc announced that all resolutions at the Annual General Meeting of the company (AGM) held on July 23, 2024 were duly passed by shareholders.

  * ![ICON_Dublin-Reception](https://icon.widen.net/content/vrggzw7eao/web/ICON_Dublin-Reception.jpg?crop=yes&w=545&h=545&itok=w9yV3vYF)

10 July 2024

### [ ICON recognised for leadership position in clinical research industry and as socially responsible employer  ](/news-events/press-releases/icon-recognised-leadership-position-clinical-research-industry-and)

At the CRO Leadership Awards 2024, ICON was recognised for its excellence in clinical research in all categories.

  * ![icon-dublin-office-headquarters](https://icon.widen.net/content/udzs5nykqq/web/icon-dublin-office-headquarters.jpg?crop=yes&w=545&h=545&itok=XnJV8LAZ)

01 July 2024

### [ ICON plc schedules second quarter 2024 earnings conference call  ](/news-events/press-releases/icon-plc-schedules-second-quarter-2024-earnings-conference-call)

A conference call and webcast to discuss its financial results and performance on July 25, 2024. 

  * ![icon-dublin-office-hq-building](https://icon.widen.net/content/pmedgzmm9y/web/icon-dublin-office-hq-building.jpg?crop=yes&w=545&h=545&itok=rF9OVQ9I)

04 June 2024

### [ ICON plc to Present at the Jefferies Global Healthcare Conference  ](/news-events/press-releases/icon-plc-present-jefferies-global-healthcare-conference)

ICON plc today announced that Dr. Steve Cutler, CEO of ICON plc, will present at the Jefferies Global Healthcare Conference on Thursday, June 6, 2024 at 1:30pm ET.
